data.title: Investing Club: Jim Cramer adds new layer to his 2022 stock-picking strategy
data.description: "Not only does it have to make a profit, but it has to have such excess demand that it can raise prices and maybe even raise prices at will," CNBC's Jim Cramer said Friday.
